description: Trap message is generated when the interface is looped.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-LPBKDT-MIB::h3cLpbkdtTrapLoopbacked IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: Trap message is generated when the loops on the interface
are eliminated.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-LPBKDT-MIB::h3cLpbkdtTrapRecovered IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: Trap message is generated when the interface is looped in the VLAN.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-LPBKDT-MIB::h3cLpbkdtTrapPerVlanLoopbacked IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-LPBKDT-MIB::h3cLpbkdtVlanID i 1

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The ID of VLAN.
variables.name: H3C-LPBKDT-MIB::h3cLpbkdtVlanID

description: Trap message is generated when the loop on the interface
is eliminated in the VLAN.

event.Summary: Loopback condition cleared on VLAN $v3 interface

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-LPBKDT-MIB::h3cLpbkdtTrapPerVlanRecovered IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE H3C-LPBKDT-MIB::h3cLpbkdtVlanID i 1

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The ID of VLAN.
variables.name: H3C-LPBKDT-MIB::h3cLpbkdtVlanID
